item.title: uname Linux T-Shirt
item.description: Spread your love for Linux by showing the best output the uname command can give on your t-shirt.

item.title: Close Windows and Run Linux
item.description: A funny t-shirt for fans of Linux that suggests to close Windows and run Linux instead to have a more joyful life when spending time with your computer.

item.title: Bash Fork Bomb T-Shirt White Print
item.description: This cryptic Bash command will crash a Linux or Unix system. Administrators, hackers, and some regular computer users will understand the message, others may be puzzled by this mystery shirt.

item.title: COL PANIC T-Shirt for Unix/Linux Geeks
item.description: A shirt for system administrators, computer programmers and all other people who use Linux or Unix based operating system on their computers and want to show it with a sense of humor, that only insiders will understand.

item.title: cd pub more beer - Drinking Pun T-Shirt
item.description: A funny t-shirt for coders, hackers, system administrators and all other computer users who like to work on the command line.

item.title: There's no place like ~ White Shirt
item.description: A tee design showing the text There's no place like ~, the home directory on Unix and Linux based operating systems using condensed and monospace white typefaces.

item.title: VI VI VI Editor of the Beast
item.description: This t-shirt shows the text vi vi vi Editor of the Beast in a heavy metal style font.

item.title: May The Source Be With You
item.description: Having access to the source code of software is like the force for computer programmers. Get this cool yellow text t-shirt if you love science fiction and open source code.

item.title: Bash Fork Bomb T-Shirt Green Print
item.description: This cryptic Bash command will crash a Linux or Unix system. Administrators, hackers, and some regular computer users will understand the message, others may be puzzled by this mystery shirt.
